animeTitle: Hajime no Ippo: A New Challenger
otherNames: Fighting Spirit: New Challenger, はじめの一歩 新シリーズ
synopsis: Ippo, a timid highschooler, is one day saved from being beaten up by Takamura, a boxer. Enthralled by Takamura’s skills Ippo begins to learn boxing, soon finding love for the sport and a drive to challenge the boxing world.
